channel.title: Help Help Help Help Help Help Help
channel.description: I have a real urgent problem!!! This is my first time doing this kind of thing with my server. I added a variable to the server (508 btw) called quest1. I added it in filemanager to create it and in the player files in bulby. No compiler errors and then i see that Quest1 pops up in my character file. I am saying yay i added it w000t...Well then suddenly my friend was telling me he logged on and his account got reset. Then i logged on and my account also got reset. Then i got my stats up again logged out and in...and i was reset again. Every time i get reset for some reason. Please help me this is really annoying and i will accept any help right now! Thankyou.

item.title: Help Help Help Help Help Help Help
item.dc:creator: @deery50 deery50
item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

I have a real urgent problem!!! This is my first time doing this kind of thing with my server. I added a variable to the server (508 btw) called quest1. I added it in filemanager to create it and in the player files in bulby. No compiler errors and then i see that Quest1 pops up in my character file. I am saying yay i added it w000t…Well then suddenly my friend was telling me he logged on and his account got reset. Then i logged on and my account also got reset. Then i got my stats up again logged out and in…and i was reset again. Every time i get reset for some reason. Please help me this is really annoying and i will accept any help right now! Thankyou.
